review: this is my fair review. I must say that they're all very friendly and thorough. Everyone took their time explaining things such as next steps. in addition, the doctor was extremely detailed in her explanations as to my next dental steps to improve my smile. Here the dentist try to learn about patients on a more personal level before beginning treatment to make patients feel more comfortable. This puts patients at ease and makes them feel like the dentist truly cares about them as whole healthy people, not just about their mouths. . I am happy to found such dental clinic.. If you're looking to have a pleasurable experience at the dentist, this is the place for you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Its an awesome experience .the doctor was friendly and dedicated ..She has a remarkable ability to inspire confidence in her patients because of her thorough and methodical approach. She is very detailed and transparent in explaining the problems as also their resolution. We can freely interact with her..,totally impressed when  I was treated for the first time  ,the way she followed up.
She takes her work seriously and does it with passion.
Thank you

review:
Too many great reasons why Nakshtra Dental is the best dental clinic to list here! Dr. Dhakshayani  smile and care is what makes this office the best. EVERYONE in her office are professional and friendly, very personal service. Dr Dhakshayani is the most skilled and compassionate dentist, I have ever met. My daughter was extremely anxious prior to our first treatment. Now, she look forward to go to his clinic again for follow up. Dr. Dhakshayani make sure to give her patients the best care and awareness post treatment. The medical book, billing, post treatment procedures and everything was instructed properly.
The office building is comfortable, attractive and clean! An Absolute 5 Star Experience!

I went to clinic for Root Canal treatment and comfortable with the crown placed. Doctor is well experienced and friendly moreover she explain each procedure clearly.Compared to other clinic they are budget friendly. Thanks doctor and highly satisfied with treatment done. Special mention clinic is tidy and clean. Everyone is hospitable.
reply_text: thank you so much for your valuable feedback mam..

review: Very friendly doctor, the way she explains the issue with the patients is really good, the treatment and I've to appreciate the follow-up of the customers. I'll definitely recommend her for any tooth issues. Fee is very less compartive with other clinics.

I  had  severe tooth ache , so I went there doctor advised for root canal treatment. Now I'm feeling comfortable . Doctor is very kind and explains everything clearly.
Thank you doctor.

Highly professional and great care taken by Dr.Dhatshayani for Root Canal Treatment and Tooth fixing for my posterior teeth.! Extremely patient doctors taking gentle care throughout the whole procedure. Recommended for any dental care.
